item.title: Google’s Pixel 8 Pro is $599, and includes a free Pixel Watch 2
item.description: The Pixel 9A is a tempting phone for $499, but even more tempting is the 128GB Pixel 8 Pro, which is selling for $599 unlocked right now at the Google Store. Its perks are well worth the extra $100. Y

item.title: A mess of its own making: Google nerfs second Pixel phone battery this year
item.description: People don’t upgrade phones every year anymore—longevity matters.

item.title: The original Pixel Fold is over $1,000 off on the last day of Prime Day
